## Task 1: 
### Task Option 2: Get the maximum and minimum of GDP per capita for all continents.
```{r, warning = FALSE}
gapminder %>% 
  group_by(continent) %>% 
  summarize(max_gdpPercap = max(gdpPercap),
            country_max_gdpPercap = country[gdpPercap == max_gdpPercap],
            year_max_gdpPercap = year[gdpPercap == max_gdpPercap],
            min_gdpPercap = min(gdpPercap),
            country_min_gdpPercap= country[gdpPercap == min_gdpPercap],
            year_min_gdpPercap = year[gdpPercap == min_gdpPercap],) %>% 
DT::datatable()
```
